1: אִמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Say</n> לַאֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>ye unto your brethren</n> עַמִּ֑י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Ammi</n> וְלַאֲחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>269 </sup> <n>and to your sisters</n> רֻחָֽמָה׃ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>Ruhamah</n>
2: רִ֤יבוּ <sup>7378 </sup> <n>Plead</n> בְאִמְּכֶם֙ <sup>517 </sup> <n>with your mother</n> רִ֔יבוּ <sup>7378 </sup> <n>plead</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> אִשְׁתִּ֔י <sup>802 </sup> <n>for she [is] not my wife</n> וְאָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>am not</n> אִישָׁ֑הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>neither [am] I her husband</n> וְתָסֵ֤ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>let her therefore put away</n> זְנוּנֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>2183 </sup> <n>her whoredoms</n> מִפָּנֶ֔יה <sup>6440 </sup> <n>out of her sight</n> וְנַאֲפוּפֶ֖יהָ <sup>5005 </sup> <n>and her adulteries</n> מִבֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> שָׁדֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>7699 </sup> <n>from between her breasts</n>
3: פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>Or</n> אַפְשִׁיטֶ֣נָּה <sup>6584 </sup> <n>Lest I strip</n> עֲרֻמָּ֔ה <sup>6174 </sup> <n>her naked</n> וְהִ֨צַּגְתִּ֔יהָ <sup>3322 </sup> <n>and set</n> כְּי֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>her as in the day</n> הִוָּֽלְדָ֑הּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that she was born</n> וְשַׂמְתִּ֣יהָ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and make</n> כַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>her as a wilderness</n> וְשַׁתִּ֙הָ֙ <sup>7896 </sup> <n>and set</n> כְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> צִיָּ֔ה <sup>6723 </sup> <n>her like a dry</n> וַהֲמִתִּ֖יהָ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and slay</n> בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <sup>6772 </sup> <n>her with thirst</n>
4: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּנֶ֖יהָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>upon her children</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> אֲרַחֵ֑ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>And I will not have mercy</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> בְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for they [be] the children</n> זְנוּנִ֖ים <sup>2183 </sup> <n>of whoredoms</n> הֵֽמָּה׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> זָֽנְתָה֙ <sup>2181 </sup> <n>hath played the harlot</n> אִמָּ֔ם <sup>517 </sup> <n>For their mother</n> הֹבִ֖ישָׁה <sup>3001 </sup> <n>them hath done shamefully</n> הֽוֹרָתָ֑ם <sup>2029 </sup> <n>she that conceived</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמְרָ֗ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>for she said</n> אֵלְכָ֞ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will go</n> אַחֲרֵ֤י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> מְאַהֲבַי֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>my lovers</n> נֹתְנֵ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that give</n> לַחְמִי֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>[me] my bread</n> וּמֵימַ֔י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and my water</n> צַמְרִ֣י <sup>6785 </sup> <n>my wool</n> וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <sup>6593 </sup> <n>and my flax</n> שַׁמְנִ֖י <sup>8081 </sup> <n>mine oil</n> וְשִׁקּוּיָֽי׃ <sup>8250 </sup> <n>and my drink</n>
6: לָכֵ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> הִנְנִי־ <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> שָׂ֥ךְ <sup>7753 </sup> <n>Therefore behold I will hedge</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דַּרְכֵּ֖ךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>up thy way</n> בַּסִּירִ֑ים <sup>5518 </sup> <n>with thorns</n> וְגָֽדַרְתִּי֙ <sup>1443 </sup> <n>and make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּדֵרָ֔הּ <sup>1448 </sup> <n>wall</n> וּנְתִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <sup>5410 </sup> <n>her paths</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> תִמְצָֽא׃ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>that she shall not find</n>
7: וְרִדְּפָ֤ה <sup>7291 </sup> <n>And she shall follow</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מְאַהֲבֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>after her lovers</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>she will not</n> תַשִּׂ֣יג <sup>5381 </sup> <n>but she shall not overtake</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וּבִקְשָׁ֖תַם <sup>1245 </sup> <n>them and she shall seek</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>but will not</n> תִמְצָ֑א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>them but shall not find</n> וְאָמְרָ֗ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>[them] then shall she say</n> אֵלְכָ֤ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will go</n> וְאָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and return</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אִישִׁ֣י <sup>376 </sup> <n>husband</n> הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <sup>7223 </sup> <n>to my first</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>it was</n> ט֥וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>for then [was it] better</n> לִ֛י אָ֖ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>then</n> מֵעָֽתָּה׃ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>with me than now</n>
8: וְהִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָֽדְעָ֔ה <sup>3045 </sup> <n>For she did not know</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>who</n> נָתַ֣תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that I gave</n> לָ֔הּ הַדָּגָ֖ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>her corn</n> וְהַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and wine</n> וְהַיִּצְהָ֑ר <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and oil</n> וְכֶ֨סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>her silver</n> הִרְבֵּ֥יתִי <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and multiplied</n> לָ֛הּ וְזָהָ֖ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and gold</n> עָשׂ֥וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[which] they prepared</n> לַבָּֽעַל׃ <sup>1168 </sup> <n>for Baal</n>
9: לָכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> אָשׁ֔וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Therefore will I return</n> וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and take away</n> דְגָנִי֙ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>my corn</n> בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>in the time</n> וְתִירוֹשִׁ֖י <sup>8492 </sup> <n>thereof and my wine</n> בְּמֽוֹעֲד֑וֹ <sup>4150 </sup> <n>in the season</n> וְהִצַּלְתִּי֙ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>thereof and will recover</n> צַמְרִ֣י <sup>6785 </sup> <n>my wool</n> וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <sup>6593 </sup> <n>and my flax</n> לְכַסּ֖וֹת <sup>3680 </sup> <n>[given] to cover</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <sup>6172 </sup> <n>her nakedness</n>
10: וְעַתָּ֛ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and then</n> אֲגַלֶּ֥ה <sup>1540 </sup> <n>And now will I discover</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַבְלֻתָ֖הּ <sup>5040 </sup> <n>her lewdness</n> לְעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <sup>157 </sup> <n>of her lovers</n> וְאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and none</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and no</n> יַצִּילֶ֥נָּה <sup>5337 </sup> <n>shall deliver</n> מִיָּדִֽי׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>her out of mine hand</n>
11: וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <sup>7673 </sup> <n>to cease</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> מְשׂוֹשָׂ֔הּ <sup>4885 </sup> <n>I will also cause all her mirth</n> חַגָּ֖הּ <sup>2282 </sup> <n>her feast days</n> חָדְשָׁ֣הּ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>her new moons</n> וְשַׁבַּתָּ֑הּ <sup>7676 </sup> <n>and her sabbaths</n> וְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מוֹעֲדָֽהּ׃ <sup>4150 </sup> <n>and all her solemn feasts</n>
12: וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֗י <sup>8074 </sup> <n>And I will destroy</n> גַּפְנָהּ֙ <sup>1612 </sup> <n>her vines</n> וּתְאֵ֣נָתָ֔הּ <sup>8384 </sup> <n>and her fig trees</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of which</n> אָמְרָ֗ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>whereof she hath said</n> אֶתְנָ֥ה <sup>866 </sup> <n>These [are] my rewards</n> הֵ֙מָּה֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>These</n> לִ֔י אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> נָֽתְנוּ־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>have given</n> לִ֖י מְאַֽהֲבָ֑י <sup>157 </sup> <n>that my lovers</n> וְשַׂמְתִּ֣ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>me and I will make</n> לְיַ֔עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>them a forest</n> וַאֲכָלָ֖תַם <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat</n> חַיַּ֥ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>and the beasts</n> הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n>
13: וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>And I will visit</n> עָלֶ֗יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְמֵ֤י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>upon her the days</n> הַבְּעָלִים֙ <sup>1168 </sup> <n>of Baalim</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>When</n> תַּקְטִ֣יר <sup>6999 </sup> <n>wherein she burned incense</n> לָהֶ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>to them</n> וַתַּ֤עַד <sup>5710 </sup> <n>to them and she decked</n> נִזְמָהּ֙ <sup>5141 </sup> <n>herself with her earrings</n> וְחֶלְיָתָ֔הּ <sup>2484 </sup> <n>and her jewels</n> וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>along</n> אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <sup>157 </sup> <n>her lovers</n> וְאֹתִ֥י <sup>853 </sup> שָׁכְחָ֖ה <sup>7911 </sup> <n>and forgat</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> פ
14: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְפַתֶּ֔יהָ <sup>6601 </sup> <n>Therefore behold I will allure</n> וְהֹֽלַכְתִּ֖יהָ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>her Bring</n> הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>her into the wilderness</n> וְדִבַּרְתִּ֖י <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and speak</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> לִבָּֽהּ׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>comfortably</n>
15: וְנָתַ֨תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will give</n> לָ֤הּ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כְּרָמֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>her her vineyards</n> מִשָּׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵ֥מֶק <sup>6010 </sup> <n>from thence and the valley</n> עָכ֖וֹר <sup>5911 </sup> <n>of Achor</n> לְפֶ֣תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>for a door</n> תִּקְוָ֑ה <sup>8615 </sup> <n>of hope</n> וְעָ֤נְתָה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and she shall sing</n> שָּׁ֙מָּה֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> כִּימֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>there as in the days</n> נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <sup>5271 </sup> <n>of her youth</n> וִּכְי֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and as in the day</n> עֲלֹתָ֥הּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>when she came up</n> מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> ס
16: וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בַיּוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall be at that day</n> הַהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> תִּקְרְאִ֖י <sup>7121 </sup> <n>[that] thou shalt call</n> אִישִׁ֑י <sup>376 </sup> <n>me Ishi</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and will no</n> תִקְרְאִי־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and shalt call</n> לִ֥י ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> בַּעְלִֽי׃ <sup>1180 </sup> <n>me no more Baali</n>
17: וַהֲסִרֹתִ֛י <sup>5493 </sup> <n>For I will take away</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמ֥וֹת <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the names</n> הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <sup>1168 </sup> <n>of Baalim</n> מִפִּ֑יהָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>out of her mouth</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יִזָּכְר֥וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>and they shall no more be remembered</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n> בִּשְׁמָֽם׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by their name</n>
18: וְכָרַתִּ֨י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>will I make</n> לָהֶ֤ם בְּרִית֙ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> חַיַּ֤ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>for them with the beasts</n> הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> וְעִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> ע֣וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>and with the fowls</n> הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> וְרֶ֖מֶשׂ <sup>7431 </sup> <n>and [with] the creeping things</n> הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the ground</n> וְקֶ֨שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>the bow</n> וְחֶ֤רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>and the sword</n> וּמִלְחָמָה֙ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>and the battle</n> אֶשְׁבּ֣וֹר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>and I will break</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the earth</n> וְהִשְׁכַּבְתִּ֖ים <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and will make them to lie down</n> לָבֶֽטַח׃ <sup>983 </sup> <n>safely</n>
19: וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <sup>781 </sup> <n>And I will betroth</n> לִ֖י לְעוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>thee unto me for ever</n> וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <sup>781 </sup> <n>yea I will betroth</n> לִי֙ בְּצֶ֣דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>thee unto me in righteousness</n> וּבְמִשְׁפָּ֔ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and in judgment</n> וּבְחֶ֖סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>and in lovingkindness</n> וּֽבְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <sup>7356 </sup> <n>and in mercies</n>
20: וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <sup>781 </sup> <n>I will even betroth</n> לִ֖י בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <sup>530 </sup> <n>thee unto me in faithfulness</n> וְיָדַ֖עַתְּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and thou shalt know</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
21: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶֽעֱנֶה֙ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>I will hear</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֶעֱנֶ֖ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>I will hear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> וְהֵ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and they</n> יַעֲנ֥וּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and they shall hear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n>
22: וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>And the earth</n> תַּעֲנֶ֔ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>shall hear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדָּגָ֖ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>the corn</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and the wine</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיִּצְהָ֑ר <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and the oil</n> וְהֵ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and they</n> יַעֲנ֥וּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and they shall hear</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <sup>3157 </sup> <n>Jezreel</n>
23: וּזְרַעְתִּ֤יהָ <sup>2232 </sup> <n>And I will sow</n> לִּי֙ בָּאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>her unto me in the earth</n> וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֖י <sup>7355 </sup> <n>and I will have mercy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> רֻחָ֑מָה <sup>7355 </sup> <n>compassion</n> וְאָמַרְתִּ֤י <sup>559 </sup> <n>and I will say</n> לְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were not</n> עַמִּי֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to [them which were] not my people</n> עַמִּי־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Thou [art] my people</n> אַ֔תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and I</n> יֹאמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and they shall say</n> אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>[Thou art] my God</n> פ
